attributes.action: Remove Priti Patel from the Home office.
attributes.additional_details: As a daughter of an immigrant family she has consistantly made it almost impossible to allow Ukrainian Women and Children from entering the UK when fleeing war torn Uktaine.
attributes.background: Remove Priti Patel from the Home office.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. This includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
